definition: the Northern Zhou Dynasty (557-581)/one of the Northern Dynasties
north/(classical) to be defeated
surname Zhou/Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC)
to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially

sentences.english: The reform of Taihe New System in Northern Zhou shaped the financial systems in Sui and Tang Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 太和新制，經過北周改革，最終形成隋唐財政制度。

sentences.english: Northern Zhou spent in Yuzhong County, the County and the Son of Man, is still Jincheng County.
sentences.chinese: 北周廢榆中縣，其地並人子城縣，仍屬金城郡。

sentences.english: Statue of Northern Zhou Dynasty in Maijishan has obvious characteristics of Xiao Liang's statue in the Southern Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 麥積山北周造像具有明顯的南朝蕭梁造像特徵。

sentences.english: Northern Qi collapsed first, and next was attacked by northern Chou and Chen, then it came down at last.
sentences.chinese: 北齊自身衰落，再加北周與陳的合攻，才終致滅亡。

sentences.english: Section three expounds the militarism of Northern Zhou.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分論述了西魏北周的軍國主義特色。
